name: Gelatinous
description:
Play as Gelly and platform around in this chill, short adventure.

This is my first project ever published!  Short, sweet, chill, and dare I say enjoyable.

Credits:

Title screen logo by earthninkstudio

Level Tile Art: Super Pixel Dungeon and Super Pixel Ice Cavern by unTied Games

Music: "Carefree" and "The Forest and the Trees" by Kevin MacLeod

Game is based on a project from the GameDev.tv Unity2D course
